mapper.select: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.agree.repository.AgreeMapper.getAgreeDetail */ select em.bill_name_kg --안건이름kg , em.bill_name_ru --안건이름ru , em.etc_kg --비고kg , em.etc_ru --비고ru , em.ppsr_id --제안자 , em.stat_cd --상태 , to_char(em.reg_dt, 'DD-MM-YYYY') as regDate , case when (ep.sign_dt is not null and ep.sign_cnc_dt is null) then 'Y' else 'N' end as agreeYn --동의여부 , scl_dsc_rcp_nmb --사회토론번호 from ebs_proposer ep left join ebs_master em on em.bill_id = ep.bill_id where em.bill_id = #{billId} and ep.proposer_id = #{userId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.agree.repository.AgreeMapper.selectAgreeProposerList */ select ep.proposer_id -- 제안자 대상 , case when (ep.sign_dt is not null and ep.sign_cnc_dt is null) then 'Y' else 'N' end as agreeYn -- 동의여부 , cm.member_nm_kg as member_nm -- 의원이름 , cm.poly_nm -- 정당이름 , cm.poly_cd -- 정당코드 from ebs_proposer ep left join com_member cm on cm.member_id = ep.proposer_id where ep.bill_id = #{billId}
